name: Days of Descent
description:
What is at the Bottom?

Maintain Your Submarine as you try and reach the bottom of a chasm, urged by a voice in your head.

Can you descend all 12 days, or will the sea swallow you whole?

Credits:

Created by Ppdolphinyy for the 2022.1 Brackeys GameJam

Audio Sources:

Background Music: Eric Matyas- soundimage.org
